snippet: New York Theater Ballet, which has to leave the building where it has had its headquarters for 34 years, will move its offices and training arm to St. Mark’s Church in-the-Bowery on East 10th Street.
abstract: New York Theater Ballet, which has to leave the building where it has had its headquarters for 34 years, will move its offices and training arm to St. Mark’s Church in-the-Bowery on East 10th Street.

headline.main: A New Home for New York Theater Ballet
